original_title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: Spooktacular Pony Tales
overview: Join your favorite residents of Ponyville — Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy, Rarity, Applejack, Pinkie Pie and, of course, Spike — as they take on some of the spookiest adventures Equestria’s ever seen! Time to gather around and hold on tight, because these six exciting tales are a chillingly good romp!
title: My Little Pony Friendship Is Magic: Spooktacular Pony Tales
